Resources on T.S. Eliot

Answers.com Reference for T.S. Eliot
A very good reference at Answers.com.

Modern American Poetry T.S. Eliot Page

T.S. Eliot page at Bartleby.com

The Possibility of a Poetic Drama
The full text of Eliot's article as it appeared in The Dial in November of 1920. Provided by the University of Virginia.

TSE: The Web Site and Listserv
A T.S. Eliot website and listserv. Subscription instructions are on the site. Site also includes an excellent search engine.

Thomas Stearns Eliot Winner of the 1948 Nobel Prize in Literature
This site is part of the Nobel Prize Internet Archive. It deals specifically with Eliot's Nobel awarded in 1948, and contains some biographical information as well.
